title: Digital Mars C & C++ compiler & IDE.iso
description:
Features

    * Support for Win32, Win16, DOS16 and DOS32 all in one package. (X32VM free from www.dosextender.com required for DOS32)
    * Fastest compile/link times in the industry.
    * Powerful optimization technology with advanced register allocation and instruction scheduling.
    * Design by Contract added into C++.
    * SGI&#039;s Standard Template Library 3.3.
    * STLport 4.5.3 (for Win32).
    * Integrated development and debugging environment (IDDE).
    * Project Express
    * Resource Studio
    * Express Agents for generating MFC apps.
    * Documentation in browsable HTML format.
    * Tutorials and sample code.
    * Updates available online from www.digitalmars.com.
    * Extensive set of related tools like resource compiler, object disassembler, librarian, resource editors, make, etc.
    * Complete library source, including floating point.
    * Command line versions as well as GUI versions of tools.
    * Windows 32 as well as Windows 3.1 API documentation, including OLE, MCI, Sockets, Pen, ODBC, and MFC documentation in Windows Help format.
    * 30 day money back guarantee if not completely satisfied.
    * No registration required, no time bombs, no activation fees.
    * Includes the Extended Utility Pack free!
    * Even more features!
